A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To be honest this is a pretty good Star Wars movie. I obviously don’t think it’s better than force awakens but it’s a strong sequel that I enjoyed a lot. It felt like the final movie in the trilogy and that’s saying a lot. A strong solid entry in this new sequel trilogy in the Star Wars saga. Luke Skywalker had the best performance in the whole movie and Rey had the worst as there’s so many things that happen that made me not care about Rey anymore. Overall I won’t spoil the rest just go and watch it. You’ll have a fun time watching this movie.
